description: Numbers n such that (21^n+1)/22 is a prime.
comments: Some of the larger terms may only correspond to probable primes.Searching to n=100000. [From _Paul Bourdelais_, Mar 24 2010]
links: H. Dubner and T. Granlund, Primes of the Form (b^n+1)/(b+1), J. Integer Sequences, 3 (2000), #P00.2.7.
